pageProduct.name: Vital Organic Greens Powder 200gm
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vital Organic Greens (formerly called Vital Just Greens) is a combination of 6 nutrient rich, green superfood ingredients to support energy, immunity and overall health.*

An organic blend, rich in antioxidants and nutrients that help to alkalise and cleanse so your body can reap the benefits every day. It is designed for convenience at maximum health benefits. It can be enjoyed by the whole family, helping support a healthier lifestyle.

Perfect for those seeking organic, just green food with maximum nutritional value that’s convenient to take.

A convenient dose of greens

Do you struggle to get your 5-a-day because of a busy lifestyle? With Vital Organic Greens, you can get the best of all the greens you need for optimum health without the hassle of consuming large quantities of expensive superfoods. Now, thanks to the convenience of Vital Organic Greens, you can get all the green power you need in one small, convenient dose.

Vital Organic Greens super-charged concentrated formula combines six of Mother Nature’s richest green superfoods; spirulina, chlorella, wheat grass, barley grass, kale and broccoli. This organic blend of antioxidant-rich, power-packed ingredients can help to cleanse and alkalise your system, support immunity, and boost your energy levels.

Health benefits of Vital Organic Greens:

  • Contains a variety of essential vitamins and minerals, which are important for body function and preventing diseases related to nutritional deficiencies.
  • Aids in increasing beneficial flora in the gastrointestinal tract, which is important for digestion.
  • Contains antioxidants that can protect the body from free radicals and alleviates inflammation, reducing the damage to cells.
  • A good source of dietary fibre, which can keep the digestive system working efficiently.
  • Easily absorbed into the body to help maximise health benefits straight away.

Vital Organic Greens contains only the best quality, natural and organic ingredients, meaning it’s safe for the whole family. It’s also vegan-friendly, gluten free, dairy free and organic! Whether you want to supplement your diet or need extra energy or immune system support, Vital Organic Greens is the convenient solution.

Warnings

This product may not be right for you. Always read the label, warnings and instructions for use, before purchase. Vitamin and Mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
Always read the label. Follow directions for use. If symptoms persist talk to your healthcare professional.

Ingredients

Spirulina* (24.8%), Kale* (17.4%), Broccoli* (17.4%), Barley Grass* (17.4%), Wheat Grass* (17.4%), Chlorella* (5%), Stevia (<1%), Monk Fruit (<1%), Thaumatin (<1%).

*100% Certified Organic

Directions

Dosage: 1-2 teaspoonful’s when desired
